Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class RAM

java.lang.Object
eu.tivian.hardware.Memory
eu.tivian.hardware.RAM
public class RAM
extends Memory
RAM chip, based on TMS4416 used in C16.
Only basic RAS and CAS functionality is available.
Since:
2019-11-06
Author:
Pawe≈Ç Kania
See Also:
Memory, TMS4416 datasheet

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void enable()
    Changes the direction of the data bus according to the level at enable and rw.
    RAM.State state()
    Returns internal state of the memory chip.
    private void update()
    Updates the state of the memory according to the ras, cas and rw pins.

  • Constructor Details

    • RAM

      public RAM​(int inputs, int outputs, int size)
      Initializes memory with default name and fills memory with random bytes.
      Parameters:
      inputs - number of input pins
      outputs - number of output pins
      size - size of the word stored in the memory

    • RAM

      public RAM​(String name, int inputs, int outputs, int size)
      Initializes memory with given name and fills memory with random bytes.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the chip
      inputs - number of input pins
      outputs - number of output pins
      size - size of the word stored in the memory

    • RAM

      public RAM​(String name, int inputs, int outputs, int size, boolean fillRandom)
      Initializes memory with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the chip
      inputs - number of input pins
      outputs - number of output pins
      size - size of the word stored in the memory
      fillRandom - if true then memory will with random bytes

      Changes the direction of the data bus according to the level at enable and rw.
